mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET."ORDER" (ONUM, ID, STORE, ODATE, OSTATE) VALUES(ONUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, (SELECT STORE FROM SELLER s WHERE STORE=#{store}), SYSDATE, 'B')

INSERT INTO MARKET.ORDERDETAIL (ODNUM, ICODE, ONUM, ODSTOCK, OPRICE, STORE) VALUES(ODNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT DISTINCT ICODE FROM INVENPRICE i2 WHERE ICODE =#{icode}), ONUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{odstock}, (SELECT DISTINCT OPRICE FROM INVENPRICE i2 WHERE ICODE =#{icode} AND CDATE = (SELECT MAX(CDATE) FROM INVENPRICE i WHERE ICODE =#{icode} GROUP BY ICODE)), (SELECT STORE FROM SELLER s WHERE STORE=#{store}))
mapper.select: SELECT o.ONUM,i.ICODE, i.INAME ,o2.ODSTOCK,o2.OPRICE ,o.STORE FROM "ORDER" o INNER JOIN ORDERDETAIL o2 ON o2.ONUM = o.ONUM INNER JOIN INVENTORY i ON i.ICODE = o2.ICODE WHERE ID=#{id} AND o.STORE=#{store} AND OSTATE = 'B'
